name: Fire Emblem: An Unexpected Caller
description:
An Unexpected Caller is a group hack using the Telephone format, seen previously in Call of the Armor, Bells of Byelen, and Embers Entwined. Those hacks stand out in large part due to their varied, unique characters and interesting custom maps. This hack features neither of those.

The premise of this hack is simple. Make an entirely custom campaign, only using the maps and characters from the vanilla GBA games. While initially meant to be a short, lower effort hack after most of the team had just finished their work on Bells of Byelen, this project still ended up being a significantly longer endeavour than Call of the Armor, which we hope shows.

name: Assassin's Creed II: Black Edition
description:
A limited edition available in parts of Europe and Australia.

It included:
• "Master Assassin" Ezio Auditore da Firenze upgrade figurine with black collector's box.
• 3 in-game bonus missions, allowing Ezio to explore the following: Palazzo Medici in Florence, Santa Maria dei Frari in Venice, and Arsenal Shipyard in Venice.
• "Conspiracy book": A book from the developers of the game, describing the development and the storyline (with extra commentary on the "conspiracy"). 64 pages, hardcover, "leather style".
• DVD with all the videos, behind-the-scene interviews and "e-goodies" about Assassin's Creed II, and game soundtrack by Jesper Kyd (BAFTA nominee for "2009 Best Original Score in a Game").
• Black packaging with unique holographic signature.

Complete the final story mission for Modern Warfare Zombies and prepare for a clean up on aisle five in Call of Duty: Warzone with the return of the Superstore in Urzikstan.

"Before it turns into a memory": Kawana Misaki tries to find out what happened to Orihara Kouhei, with the help of Kouzuki Mio and Miyama Yukimi.
"Sweet": Orihara Kouhei and Satomura Akane enjoy their daily life as boyfriend and girlfriend.

Our journey continues.

name: Nightmare Trip
description: Free vertical-scrolling shooting game inspired by the CAVE games and the Touhou series, featuring 3 preset character teams which are all available from the start, as well as the "Dream Power" system, which affects scoring and acts as a useful survival tool.

name: Witchblood
description:
In this stunning, mixed-reality adventure inspired by Metroid and Castlevania, explore an intricate diorama brimming with hidden treasures, challenging puzzles, formidable foes, and powerful magic.

After a zealous madman slays your father, you uncover ancestral magic abilities. Master these newfound powers and take on the oppressive cult dominating your town. Face the murderer of your father to reveal the mysteries of your origin and the power of your birthright.

With 6+ hours of exploration and combat, hundreds of rooms, 40 upgrades, and 4 difficulty levels to master, Witchblood transforms classic gaming with VR and MR.

name: Brave and Glory
description: This thrilling real-time strategy tower defense game immerses you in a three-dimensional world, where every decision matters and every action impacts the outcome of the battle. Get ready for epic battles and become the hero of the kingdom!

name: Terro Eliminator
description: **Terro Eliminator: New Terrorist Tension Alert!**

name: Fit in Bed
description:
Fit everyone in the bed! Make sure they're happy so they can get COSY

Meet Alex, Max, their friends and Mr Whiskers in this surreal world where people can only move by the designs of an omnipresent hand (that is you, the player).

Make sure you fulfill their desires. Do it for the cosy.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 54 with the theme Limited Space

name: CubeSat Builder: Build a NASA Spacecraft!
description: In the NASA game CubeSat Builder, build as many CubeSat spacecraft as possible in a NASA cleanroom before time runs out!

name: The Karate Kid: Street Rumble
description: Set in the iconic locations of the first three classic The Karate Kid movies, The Karate Kid: Street Rumble lets you step out of the dojo and into the streets of the 1980s San Fernando Valley and Okinawa. Battle waves of challenging enemies in this fast-paced, side-scrolling beat ’em up adventure, brought to life with colorful pixel-art visuals and chiptune music.

name: Poker Poker Magic
description: Embark on a magical journey with Caroline and Clovis in "Poker Poker Magic," a delightful 1v1 puzzle/action game for Playdate. Join Caroline, a spirited yet somewhat absent-minded magician-in-training, and her trusty dove, Ceres, as they set out to find a magical hat that could help Caroline ace her end-of-year exams at the Robert Houdin School of Prestidigitation. Little do they know, their adventure will lead them into a whimsical forest filled with colorful characters, including a clown, a four-eared rabbit, and a horse prince, each providing opportunities for thrilling magical duels.

name: Galaxy Mania
description: Galaxy Mania! This captivating puzzle game combines the excitement of merging celestial bodies with the challenge of action puzzle gameplay.

name: Pharaoh's Secret
description: Delve into more than 40 tombs filled with dangers and great treasures in a game that will test your reflexes and your ability to solve the correct way to escape each of the tombs alive.

"FOOTBALL CHAMP" is a sports game released by TAITO in 1990.
Players select their team and star player from one of eight countries in a bid for victory through a series of seven matches.
In addition to playing against the CPU, players can also enjoy playing against each other.
It’s the beautiful game, with all the speed, drama, violence and referee knockouts that any fan would expect!

name: Epyx Rogue
description: Rogue is a dungeon-crawling adventure originally developed in the early 1980s, known for introducing procedurally generated levels and permadeath, which defined the "roguelike" genre. In this game, players explore the Dungeons of Doom, battling monsters and collecting treasure in a quest for the Amulet of Yendor. The Nintendo Switch port recreates Epyx's Amiga version, featuring pixel-art graphics and optional CRT filters for a retro aesthetic, along with background music that can be toggled on or off. This version stays faithful to the original gameplay while utilizing modern hardware for a smoother visual experience.

name: Promises to Keep
description:
Promises to Keep (PTK) is a queer, furry, safe-for-work (16+) visual novel.

PTK follows the journey of a post-college snow leopard after returning to his childhood home. After a year of wishful thinking, living in the footsteps of his past and the childhood promises he has yet to fulfill, he's convinced there's nothing more for him here. Then, disaster strikes.

The current version has around 5 hours of content, featuring an original soundtrack of 15 songs, over 50 beautifully drawn backgrounds and fully-illustrated CGs, and nearly 100 unique character sprites.

name: LethalRpgDestiny
description: LethalRpg is back! Destiny follows on from conqueror. You play as the last boss from the last game, Lethal and have to escape Hades and reclaim what was taken from you. this version includes Transformations, Sword upgrades and story quests.

name: Lethal RPG Destiny: Rebirth
description: Lethal is reborn in this remake of one of my most popular rpgs. You play as Lethal, a half demon half human who once ruled a kingdom. However the human race rallied together and destroyed him. Now he's back and he's got revenge on his mind. Conquer the map and reclaim your kingdom in this turn based rpg.

name: Divine Dynamo Flamefrit
description: "Divine Dynamo Flamefrit" is bringing back classic 2D action! Play as the hero Yuto in top-down slashing adventure stages, and pilot the magical robot Flamefrit for first-person boss battles! Master both styles of gameplay to restore peace to the parallel world of Hologard!

name: Pythagorea 60°
description: Pythagorea 60° is a collection of more than 270 geometric problems of different kind that can be solved without complex constructions or calculations. All objects are drawn on a grid whose cells are equilateral triangles. A lot of levels can be solved using just your geometric intuition or by finding natural laws, regularity, and symmetry.

name: Bacteria Warfare
description: This is a bacteria-cleansing game where you can use various weapons to eliminate germs.

name: Tetris Block Puzzle
description:
Embark on a thrilling adventure - Tetris Block Puzzle

Welcome to Tetris Block Puzzle, the ultimate mobile game that combines the timeless fun of block puzzles with the iconic Tetris brand.

Unleash Tetris exclusives, clear Tetriminos, and aim for high scores!
Challenge yourself with strategic gameplay, carefully planning your moves to create perfect Line Clears.
No internet connection is needed! Play anytime, anywhere, and immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Tetris Block Puzzle.
Clear rows consecutively to earn incredible combos and showcase your Tetris Block Puzzle skills!

A new Block Puzzle Game with a Tetris twist!
Same iconic blocks, new fun game!

name: The Powerpuff Girls: Monkey Mania
description: Mojo Jojo has stolen the Powerpuff Girls' Chemical X and unleashed an army of manic monkeys and it's now your quest to save Townsville!

name: Aard and Wyzz: The rise of minions
description: Join forces and put an end to the revolution! In this local co-op 3D action-adventure game, you will control two wizards who were once one. Combine your skills and solve puzzles as you work side by side to restore balance at the office.

name: Dungeons 4: The Good, the Bad and the Evil
description: Dungeons 4 – The Good, the Bad and the Evil awaits the Absolute Evil and his more or less dedicated General Thalya with (train)wagon loads of evil work to do. Led by their fearless queen, Brynnhild, those pesky dwarves have infiltrated a new part of the Overworld, the West, and kidnapped the Council of Little Snots. In this latest adventure, the Only-too-familiar-with-hardships Evil has to face new enemies equipped with pistols, sniper rifles and rotary guns, and … a beer-brewing beast of a dwarf. But of course, the Cunning Evil is prepared and leaves you well-equipped with new traps and building options to protect your stony dungeon heart!

name: Korobo
description: Korobo is an action adventure game that follows the story of a pint-sized robot named “Korobo” and his owner, Tom, a young boy who receives Korobo as a gift from his father on his 10th birthday. Players step into the tiny but mighty shoes of Korobo, embarking on a thrilling and heartfelt journey.

name: Half-Life: Through The City
description: Through The City is a fan spin-off mod for Half-Life 2, telling the story of how City 17 Uprising began and survived it's course. Step into the boots of Corporal Adrian Shephard as he is taken out of the stasis by the G-man. While dealing with trauma of the Black Mesa Incident, Adrian takes on a dangerous task to join an unknown resistance group and begin the Uprising while facing new, never-before-seen threats.

name: The Nightmare Chronicles: Horror In Da Hood
description: Mason is assigned a new job from the big boss when strange things start happening and he discovers the true meaning of fear... Horror in Da Hood is a gripping first-person horror game set in the hood, where the supernatural lurks around every corner. Are you brave enough to face the real terror?

name: Der Weichensteller: Odyssey Live
description: The internet is puzzled by a mysterious phenomenon: Posts are suddenly reappearing on the Instagram accounts of three deceased individuals. The only common denominator: all three died in accidents. The videos are cryptic, and no one can make sense of them. Therefore, the family of the deceased Wilson is asking for your help to get to the bottom of this case. In this murder mystery, you take on the role of Consulting Detectives Falkenberg.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories
description: Sin descripción

name: Shoulders of Giants: Ultimate
description: Simultaneously control a sword-wielding robot and a gunslinging space frog in Shoulders of Giants, an explosively colourful sci-fi roguelike. Play alone, with a friend, or as part of a four-person team, cutting through waves of enemies on a quest to rescue the galaxy from the forces of Entropy!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Fading Dreams, Dimming Shadows
description:
Version 7.6 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter 3-EX: Bitterness for a Sleepwalker
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Jovial Deception: Shadowdimmer (Songque)
• New AstralOp: Serapeum
• New Featured Event: Schicksal Work Guide
• New Event: Powered Duo
• ...and more!

name: The Final Ultra Super Duper Cube Cavern Deluxe GOTY Edition
description: An action packed "shoot-em-up" through the treacherous underworld from Cube Cavern!

name: Mario Golf: World Tour - Mushroom Pack
description:
Toadette takes up the clubs in the first DLC pack for the game. You'll also get two brand new courses to play: Toad Highlands and Koopa Park. This pack will definitely
grow on you.

name: Mario Golf: World Tour - Flower Pack
description: Delicious! The Layer-Cake Desert and Sparkling Waters courses are perfect complements to each other in this pack. You'll also snag the character Nabbit.

name: Mario Golf: World Tour - Star Pack
description: The two stellar courses in this pack will have you driving deep into Mario's Star and playing through the Rock-Candy Mines. Need even more star power? How about Rosalina as a playable character!

name: Siren Head: Stranded
description:
Your car ran out of gas on a nearly abandoned country road in the middle of nowhere. Stranded and alone, your only hope to leave this unsettling dark forest is a gas station that's down the road. But something else lurks in these woods and stalks you from afar, taunting you with horrifyingly unnatural and alarmingly loud sounds. Can you escape with your life?

Your flashlight is your best friend in this hellish soundscape. It will help you find your way. But be careful, that ... monster ... hears your every move.

name: Trip's Voyage: Gem Rush
description: A fast-paced, arcade-style minigame about chasing a high-score while being chased by some ghastly foes! Originally a minigame called "Well Raider" from the game Trip's Voyage made inside Dreams for the PS4/PS5.

name: PetVille
description: PetVille is a game where you raise, dress, and care for a pet that you create. Visit your friends' houses and play with their pets to earn coins you can use to make your pet and house the coolest on the block!

name: Constellation Courier
description:
Explore the stars as you make deliveries for folks all across the galaxy in Constellation Courier!

Play as a mail courier tasked with helping the world’s creatures, big and small, communicate with each other across the vast expanse of space. Uncover their stories along the way as you fly amongst the planets and learn more about their journeys through time.

name: Super Chick
description: Introducing Super Chick, a captivating rage-platformer wrapped in an irresistibly cute aesthetic. Engage in solo or online multiplayer modes, where you can compete or playfully sabotage each other. Get ready to jump, dodge, and smile your way through Super Chick – where the only way is up!

name: Merely A Chip
description: You're Nelson, Perhaps waking up in the middle of the night is common, but not for Nelson. He's hungry and wants to eat something, but when he checks the kitchen, he can't find anything. He decides to buy some chips in the supermarket and head back home.

name: Dicey Demons
description: Do battle against your foes in our newest adventure, Dicey Demons! Choose from an array of enchanted dice to summon adorable (yet killer) demon monsters to do slay your enemies. Make your way through trials and tribulations to earn your freedom through strategic survival and careful planning!

name: Whiskers in the Dark
description:
Lurk through the underground tunnels as you stealthily make your way through them in Whiskers in the Dark.

Play as a small cat confined to the space of the shadows, hiding away from the lights (and whatever's out there) seeking to hunt you down. Carefully make your way back to the other cats who've already made their escape, but be careful not to get caught!

name: What Must Be Done
description: Knowing what must be done, you venture into the dungeon to start collecting the resources necessary. Who knows where this path will lead...

name: Tale of Two Sides
description: Through a terrible accident, you've split-apart the world into two! But you've also gained the unique ability to phase between them! Use your newfound power to undo your mess and re-unite the two sides!

name: The Lost Frames
description:
This game was made for the Mini Jam 62: Colors.

The world used to be more fluid, but some great calamity has forced the world into two frames. It is your job to go to the three worlds and bring back the animation key frame gems, only then will fluid motion be brought back to the world.

name: Echoes from the Abyss
description:
"Echoes from the Abyss" is a chilling first-person horror game set in an abandoned military bunker. Unravel the dark secrets hidden within as Maya, the daughter of a former soldier. Embark on a harrowing journey to uncover the truth behind her Father's haunted past. Solve puzzles, make your way through the bunker and confront abominable horrors in a quest for answers that could forever change her life.

The game contains flickering lights, depiction of suicide and blood.

name: Broken War
description: Broken War is an intense first-person shooter that combines different multiplayer modes.

description: A ROM hack which changes Donkey Kong Country to be centered around Mario (taken directly from Super Mario World).

description: Steal a briefcase!

name: 65536-in-1

name: Crackdown 2: Premium Deluge Pack
description: The Premium Deluge Pack features the complete Deluge co-op arcade mode where you defend the city zones against ever growing waves of Pacific City bad guys. Try it alone or with up to four players on Xbox LIVE for ever more demanding battles. In addition, the premium pack includes new achievements, avatar awards, and the sixteen-player Capture the Orb mode with 6 arenas.

name: Drop Pockets
description: The billiards roguelike. Strategic, physics based combat against Pool Sharks who don't play by the rules. Pocket your balls and clear out your opposition in this chaotic game of pool!

name: Artisan
description: Sin descripción

name: Cartenstein
description: Sin descripción

name: My Assassin Bodyguard
description:
You grew up as a part of the Time Vessel Association. One day, your friend goes against the group and is killed, making you realize how insane the Association actually is. They never cared, and never will. You want out of it, so you decide to leave everything behind and run away.

Little do you know, they send a famous assassin after you. Can you make it out alive and maybe seduce the infamous Toji Fushiguro along the way?

name: A Grave Mistake
description: You're a gravedigger out digging graves, but you accidentally summoned an apocalypse, oops! Do you have the smarts to take control of the situation and stop the cataclysm?

name: Interstellar Interruption
description: Sin descripción

name: Last Hope
description: Sin descripción

name: Morning Shift
description: Sin descripción

name: Toiletisia vs. Evil
description:
Have you ever dreamed of playing a video game about a toilet who battles devil worshippers?

Then today's your lucky day!

This is a game about a beautiful toilet police officer who has to deal with an evil cult that summoned an ancient evil demon in a creepy mansion.

name: World Weaver
description: Confront the World Weaver

name: 99 Species
description: Sin descripción
Sin descripción

name: 1812: La Aventura
description: Sin descripción

name: TWHL Tower: Source
description:
TWHL Tower: Source is the follow-up to the collaborative mods TWHL Tower and TWHL Tower 2. Each level is made by a different creator with the only limit being the size of the map. Other than that, every floor has unique and varied gameplay ranging from puzzles and platforming to intense combat sections.

TWHL Tower: Source expands on the previous mods by using Half-Life 2's Source engine together with the community made Mapbase mod to allow for even more unique gameplay possibilities. The mod features 18 floors by 15 different authors, 5 unlockable bonus maps, and over 20 in-game achievements for those seeking extra challenge.

name: Cupid's Chatroom
description: Find your true love with the help of Cupid's chatroom, a mysterious server that won't let you leave!

name: The Ice Cream Culprit
description: Your girlfriend's limited edition ice cream has been stolen! Was it you? Will you help her find it? All that is to be decided by 4 different endings.

name: Crash Bandicoot World
description:
Crash Bandicoot World is a Crash Fan-made game made by me
Looks like cortex have a new plan and crash have to stop him once again before it's Too Late
Join Crash in his new adventure !

name: Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea: Amaranthine Moon
description:
Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea: Amaranthine Moon is the otome standalone sequel to Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea, a Victorian vampire visual novel previously released in 2021. This visual novel is set around 5-6 years after the events of the first visual novel, following Lucie as the main character now that she's an adult.

Determined to make her own destiny as she turns 18, the young head of her family Lucie plunges headfirst in the conniving world of business dealings. Before she's able to seal the deal on a revolutionary treatment to vampirism, her business partner suddenly dies. Lucie finds herself embroiled in the middle of the mysterious death of her former partner and an event from a decade prior...

name: 124 Handle of the World
description:
Ever got that eerie feeling when you're in a bus, late at night? Ever thought about how much stronger that feeling must be when YOU'RE the driver? What may driving with the bus empty late at night feel like? This thought is what set me up to make this game.

In a PS1 style setting, you are a bus driver completing your night shift. You are getting tired, getting the last people off the bus to their destinations, until you're all alone. What might happen?

name: Babylon Tower
description: A color-matching puzzle game for the Uzebox.

name: Arkanoid
description: An unofficial port of Arkanoid for the LowRes NX fantasy console.

name: The Prototype
description: The Prototype is a short, analog horror-inspired kinetic visual novel.

name: Founder of the Final Cult
description: Can you survive against crazy cultists and be the last cult standing?

name: Zort
description: Zort is an action, adventure, and horror game that can be played with up to 4 people. Explore maps with your friends and have fun while escaping from various creatures. Experience a realistic horror experience with in-game voice chat with your friends!

name: SNK vs. Capcom: SVC Chaos
description:
SNK and CAPCOM legends clash in this star-studded crossover fighting game!
The 2003 arcade hit SVC CHAOS is back and better than ever!

SVC CHAOS—a dream match of epic proportions! Worlds collide as 36 iconic characters across various series from SNK (mainly THE KING OF FIGHTERS) and CAPCOM (mainly STREET FIGHTER) do battle in a frantic fight to the finish! Brand-new rollback netcode and tournament modes allow for fun, fast-paced online matches—all while still retaining the classic visuals and controls of the original fan favorite. Also comes with a hitbox viewer and a gallery mode! Rise up and throw down with players all around the world in this new evolution of the SVC CHAOS legacy!

name: Fast Food Simulator
description: Welcome to the world's most chaotic place! Play solo or co-op with up to 6 players. Run a fast-food restaurant, and work with your friends to expand your business. Take orders, make burgers, and increase your earnings by dealing with customers.

name: Party Stars
description: Party Stars is the ultimate party game where the fun never stops! Explore countless exciting maps here! Whether you crave sliding waterways during the summer, unveiling secrets hidden among mysterious stones or navigating complex tubes in the air!

name: Just Pizza
description: Welcome to Just Pizza, a game that turns your love for pizza into an exciting and rewarding experience! This game is all about clicking on a pizza to earn more pizzas. The more you click, the more pizzas you get. It’s as simple and fun as that!

name: Pokémon Rising Ruby
description: Rising Ruby and Sinking Sapphire are modifications of Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire that allow you to play through the main game with all 721 Pokémon obtainable and go through the challenge of a significantly stronger Pokémon League. A huge emphasis has been placed on Pokémon availability, with most areas in the game offering 10 or 11 species that haven't been seen before that point. The mostly equal chance of encountering any of the Pokémon in an area also mean you're unlikely to get the same thing twice on the first encounter, making the game lend itself well to Nuzlocke runs (if you can handle the extra challenge from the trainer battles!).

name: Keyframes
description: Between exams, friendships, and figuring out what a savings account is, college might just be one of the busiest times of your life. No one said adulthood was going to be easy, but it’ll be a little less painful to navigate with your two best friends by your side... and three new chance acquaintances, who happen to be the right people at the right time.

name: Campaign Trail
description: Do you have what it takes to win a Presidential Election? Select a year and a candidate to find out. You will answer questions about your platform and positions, and also about your campaign strategy. The answers will affect your popularity for better or worse, both nationally and in individual states. Walk the fine line between appealing to your base and winning a majority of the votes.

name: Incremental Mass Rewritten
description: Incremental Mass Rewritten is an incremental game focused on gaining as much mass as possible.

name: Locally Sourced Anthology I: A Space Atlas
description: Locally Sourced Anthology I: A Space Atlas is a collection of 8 experimental games, each developed by a different indie team, with each game focusing on a different

name: Thunder Jaws
description:
8-bit home computer conversions for Atari's ThunderJaws.

These conversion are single player, and features 4 levels instead the 13 levels available on the arcade version.

name: Termination Mental
description: Small base level, a remake of the original Termination Central (E3M1).

name: Deja-Vu!
description: A small 5-map episode for Quoth. Starts with base maps and ends in a Doom-like "hell bunker".

name: The Palace of Fear
description: A dark turtlemap remake of e4m4. Uses Quoth entities, so you need that mod installed.

name: Data Download
description: A map built with no more than 256 brushes. Your mission is to download some data, but there are a couple of enemies who try to prevent that. Fast and frantic non-stop action.

name: Amphitheater Of Abaddon
description: Small to medium-sized Wizard-style level. It is the follow-up to The Subterrestrial Hangar and as such again features three distinct route choices.

name: Catatonic Fits of Despair
description: Medium-sized spacious metal/runic-style fortress.

name: Shut Up, RPG!
description: Medium sized chain map by Than, Gibbie, RPG, Nightbringer.

name: Temple of Quake
description: Small to medium-sized runic-style temple with a graveyard in rocky surroundings. The level can be finished fairly quickly, but in order to visit all areas and get better equipment it requires exploration and secret-hunting.

name: The Slipgate Massacre
description: Remix/remake of the original E1M1 - The Slipgate Complex, but larger and more spacious, with many new and expanded areas.

name: The Subterrestrial Hangar
description: Small idbase level set in a miliary base/hangar. It features three distinct route choices: normal combat, permanent quad damage, and slime maze, and is supposed to be the first map of an episode focusing on these route mechanics.

name: 99 brushes or less
description: Speedmapping pack featuring six SP levels.

name: We got bored lol
description: Six small ~2-hour speedmaps + a start hub, all following different themes and based on the Copper mod (included). It comes with a custom music track.

name: BigMcGee
description: 14 speedjam SP levels made on a 64 unit grid, three custom skyboxes, and four music tracks.

name: Speedmapping Pack 196: Quick Honey
description: Weekend-long speedmapping session; eight Honey-themed singleplayer maps.

name: Speedmapping Pack 197: Six Textures - Part 2
description: 9 SP maps using not more than six textures.

name: Blood Foundry
description: 3 vanilla speedmaps made by Egg Boy.

name: Reconditus
description: Reconditus is a 4 map (+ epilogue) mapset that takes place in a world where temple-like structures have been slowly assimilated by tech/alien stuff.

name: Something Bad is on the Moon
description:
Found Footage: Apollo 17

The Apollo 17 mission was the last publicly disclosed mission to the moon.

Since then, numerous missions have been launched in absolute secrecy.

Something very bad happened on Apollo 17, and we recorded it.

name: Click The Link To Play
description: Sin descripción

name: Left 4 Dead 2: Alien Trilogy
description: A custom campaign for Left 4 Dead 2 based on the video game Alien Trilogy.

name: Man Sa Yarbah Al Malyoon
description: Man Sa Yarbah Al Malyoon is a mobile game based on the Arabic version of Who Wants To Be A Millionaire.

name: Ashbakaha
description: Combine thinking, structure and search for words.

name: Legends of Kailrate
description: Help Kailrate defeat enemies as the waves progress. Be careful of bosses, they are sometimes dangerous!

name: Line Chef
description: Have a blast becoming the best chef with your favorite LINE characters here in LINE CHEF!

name: Draconia Saga
description:
The Business and Happiness Manager from the Land of Fire, Kumamon, visits Draconia! The cute bear meets adorable pets, bringing a colorful array of surprises! Travel across the Arcadia continent with Kumamon, collect various specialties, and exchange gifts with him!

In a world where pets and humans live in harmony, you can freely capture various pets, form teams, and explore this fantasy continent with other Dragon Hunters, facing all kinds of challenges.

name: Flatout: Stuntman
description: Have a take-off run with one of the many types and sorts of vehicles, launce your handpicked character (out of many, one even crazier as the other) and proceed to aim for the objects that will do you the most damage... thus earning you the most points! Try and take some coins along the way. Ragdoll fun for everone! This contains a ton of different and fun themes, stunts, plenty of vehicles and numerous characters to have fun with.

name: Magic Floor
description: A homebrew game released for the SNES, Nintendo SuperDisc (aka Nintendo Play Station), Satellaview and the Nintendo Super System arcade machine.

name: Magic Floor
description: The original version of Magic Floor, released in 2002. This version was re-released as a multiboot game, an e-Reader card and a Nintendo DS and DSi game.

name: FlatOut
description:
This is a mobile FlatOut now having new stunning graphics and top view. Complete three stages of the competition: Bronze, Silver and Golden.
You are going to experience races in the shady woods and snowy mountains..Mud, rain, snow and many other things.

name: Magic Floor
description: A port of Magic Floor for the ZX81. A very similar version was also released for the Jupiter Ace computer.

name: Magic Floor
description: Sin descripción

name: Magic Floor
description: Sin descripción

name: Libbet the Boulder Girl
description: Sin descripción

name: Magic Floor
description: This is a firmware hack for AMT630A based TFT screens, probably the first ever homebrew game for a TFT screen, and very most likely the first ever game specifically for the undocumented AMT630A hardware.

name: Hexagod
description: A minimalist roguelike village builder where you place hexagon tiles, manage resources, and command your villagers.

name: FlatOut
description: Enjoy this great racing title with a new and impressive game engine making the driving experience a thrilling ride. A destructible environment, weather and particle effects, great physics and many more features make this game one hell of a fun racing game! Use the nitro pick-ups to boost your car, drive your opponents off the track but keep an eye on your car's damage meter, if you push too hard you'll be crashing off yourself! If you like wrecking cars this is the racing game for you!

name: Pong Consoles Simulation
description:
These are simulations of some of the most popular Pong consoles from the 1970s. The consoles included are:
Atari Home Pong (C-100)
Atari Super Pong (C-140)
Coleco Telstar
Nintendo Color TV-Game 6
Nintendo Color TV-Game 15

name: MultiVersus: Season 2 - Back in Time
description: In Season 2 unlock Samurai Jack through the new battlepass, and explore a new set of rifts to unlock Beetlejuice. There will also be new unlockable cosmetics, the Water Tower stage, and the return of ranked mode.

name: Notenogram
description: Sin descripción

name: Easyland
description: Sin descripción

name: Vectic: Boosted
description:
Vectic: The motorsport of the future.

Every year the Vectic League draws millions of fans from all over the world.
This season you will not be one of them.
This season you will be a contender.
Race with skill, speed and daring to claim your place in the record books as a Vectic legend.

Vectic uses a turn based system to bring you a new racing experience. To be victorious is to be not only the fastest but also the smartest. Gain the edge by picking your way through obstacles, optimising corners or landing the perfect hit with a laser beam. Prevail on over 40 hand built race tracks.

name: Bonk Jam!
description:
Ranger has gotten a hold of a new melee weapon: the Bonk Hammer!
The Hammer allows the player to jump higher, move faster, and fight harder!
This mod (built on Copper) also includes two additional monsters: our good friend the gaunt from Quoth (with reworked code), and Dwell's brute! Across the set of maps, you will encounter Bonk runes, which can be used to purchase awesome skins for the new hammer in the start map.

name: Tremors: Rebirth
description: A video game movie that allows you to experience Tremors

name: Deliver to When You Came
description: Deliver the meal. Don't become one yourself. An open-ended puzzle platformer based around physics and AId

name: Goomba BreakOut
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sherwood Open
description: C64 Middle Age mini-golf with Robin & friends at the Sherwood Forest...

name: World Domination wit Cam
description:
World domination is not easy. Join me as we figure it out together. I think it kind of goes like this, yeah that's the way, you're killing it!

A sort of boss battle, sort of actiony game, but don't worry, you can't die! Move the mouse around to trigger actions with the beat.

name: Shielding Color
description: Sin descripción

name: Sudo K.O.
description: Fill sudokus to fight against monsters and gain better loot as a reward. How far can you go without perishing? Claim your spot on the online leaderboards!

name: Eternal Fighters
description: Dive into Eternal Fighters, a fast-paced 2D fighting game that blends classic arcade action with modern dynamics. Choose from a roster of ninjas and warriors, each with unique abilities, and master modes like Arcade, VS, and Online. Prove your skills and become the ultimate Eternal Champion!

name: Shroudfall Cove
description: Sin descripción

name: Tom and Jerry: Food Fight
description: It's a food free-for-all! Jerry is raiding the kitchen, but he'll need your help to grab all the cheese and other food without getting trapped by Tom.

name: Wait! You can't love me!
description: Sin descripción

name: Operation Wolf
description: A port of the arcade game that supports the Zapper and the Light Phaser, for the Nintendo Entertainment System and Sega Master System respectively. All the voice acting has been removed and the targets are much smaller due to sprite limitations.

name: Project Code Name “M”
description:
New Novect game in development
Killing and Solving, Detective Adventure Game.

name: After Burner
description: A watered down port of the arcade game, with many alterations to graphics and sound in order to accommodate the low end hardware.

name: Potion Panik
description: Sin descripción

name: Ponytone
description: Ponytone is a browser karaoke game based on the My Little Pony series. The game uses the song list and note data from the game My Little Karaoke: Singing is Magic.

name: Snow Bros. Wonderland
description: Boasting gorgeous 3D isometric graphics, Snow Bros. Wonderland has the brothers defending Snow Land from The Great King of Evil! Armed with an endless supply of ice pellets, gamers can turn monsters into snowballs which can be kicked to destroy a whole horde of enemies! Chain your attacks to defeat several bad guys at once and use your snowball skills to take down massive bosses.

name: Invade-a-Load!
description: Invade-a-Load! is a Space Invaders clone that is built into the fast loader software. The game plays while the fast loader loads the Commodore 64 disk.

name: Dubscr's Murder Mystery
description: Multiplayer Social Deduction Murder Mystery Game! Want a game that you can play with your buddies and have a good time? This is the game for you. Mines, smoke grenades, tasers, custom maps, player customization, and more.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 14: Queen Dizzy
description: Adds Queen Dizzy to the roster of playable characters
1024³ 6 SP maps by efdat, Hrimfaxi, neg!ke, and Spirit

name: Chef & Friends: Recipe for Success
description: Gather a team of professional restorers and protect restaurants and cafes from Ethan's greed. Help aspiring chefs pass the assessment of the Culinary Bulletin's restaurant critic: upgrade kitchens, renovate interiors, and give owners a makeover. Chef, hurry now to discover unforgettable culinary adventures! Play Chef & Friends!

name: Speedmapping Pack 166
description: 3 smaller maps. Two of them in Doom base style, one e4ish.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 15: Venom
description: Adds Venom to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 16: Unika
description: Adds Unika to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 17: Lucy
description: Adds Lucy to the roster of playable characters

name: A Better Tomorrow
description: Join the green revolution! Relax and learn about clean energy in this cozy, minimalist 2D city-building strategy game. Build windmills, solar panels, and more to provide energy to villages and cities while protecting the environment. Let's work together to make 'A Better Tomorrow'!

name: Green Button
description:
Green button is clicker games with a simple plot that you can't put down
Idle Green Button: Money clicker is exactly what you were looking for.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 4
description:
Season Pass 4 adds 4 characters to Guilty Gear: Strive with the returning characters Queen Dizzy and Venom, the new character Unika from the anime Guilty Gear Strive: Dual Rulers and the guest character Lucy from the anime Cyberpunk: Edgerunners.
It also includes 2 new stages, the Season Pass 4 Premium Color pack with color #16 for all characters except Lucy and the Season 4 Characters Additional Colors pack for the 3 new Guilty Gear characters.

name: Feindlich Sewers
description: Medium sized castle / medieval sewers map with Makkon textures. Requires Copper v1.19+ (NOT included). The author's first release.

name: Null Bearing Redux
description: Large industrial dock-themed map with lots of exploration, using Makkon and MG1 textures. This is an updated overhaul / redesign of the author's previous release Null Bearing (2020).

name: Evil Wizard
description: Small castle surrounded by mountains, using custom textures by Makkon

name: Big Boy's Birthday Party
description: Large, open medieval castle with courtyards, a throne room, a wine cellar, and a dungeon.

name: Hard Driven
description: Medium / large-feeling metal sci-fi playground with Makkon3 textures. "Big Boy is defragging his hard drive. He must be stopped."

name: Under A Stone Blanket
description: Small tomb / crypt brick map built within a 1024^3 volume, textured with Makkon and based on Progs_dump (included).

name: Low Gravity
description: Two-day speedmapping event following a "low gravity" theme with 10 small to medium-sized levels and a start hub. It runs on the SMP mod (included) and comes with a custom skybox and a music track.

name: The Doomed Cathedral
description: Medium-sized cathedral with a base area.

name: Io. Loki Patera.
description: Large industrial sci-fi map with some Doom and Makkon textures, a few hundred monsters, and lot of secrets.

name: Io. Brimstoneburg.
description: Large lava castle / tomb map for vanilla Quake.

name: Io. Lava Cleaning Base
description: Large industrial factory/refinery level with a few arcane elements.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Blazing Edition
description: The Blazing Edition of Guilty Gear: Strive includes the base game, the 4 Season Passes, the Ultimate Edition Content Kit and the Guilty Gear 25th Anniversary: Special Additional Color Pack.

name: Azrael on the Boundary of Life or Death
description:
Rihito Souda has just started working for a major construction company in April.

Even though he is assigned to a different deparment than the one he was hoping for, he meets a senior employee by the name of Reimi Nagashima, and he slowly begins to fall in love with her.

He has a rewarding job, kind parents, and awesome friends.... All of these things seemed ideal, until one day he begins to have terrifying nightmares.

The frequency of these nightmares increases with each passing month and slowly begins to consume his life.

name: Ultimate Puzzle Adventure: Robots
description: Dive into Ultimate Puzzle Adventure: Robots with 60 playable images and three game modes. Customize your puzzle piece count and enjoy unlocked levels from the start.

name: Cyber Racers: Retro Neon Punk Drift
description: Neon Lights, High Speeds: Unleash Your Inner Racer in Cyber Racers: Retro Neon Punk Drift!

name: Jewel Fight: Heroes of Legend
description: EMBARK ON A HEROIC QUEST IN "JEWEL FIGHT"

name: The Legend of the Dragonflame High School 3
description: This is the third installment of the Beat 'em up series in which Ryuichi and his friends fight with the motorcycle gang in Yokohama!

name: Tools Up! + Ready, Steady Ship! Bundle
description: Bring your best pair of work gloves for this bundle! In Tools Up!, the objective is fix, paint, move furniture and otherwise have a chaotic time! Take on the task solo, but 4 player co-op is where the action is.

name: Metamorphosis + What the Duck Bundle
description: Strange is the new normal in this bundle! In Metamorphosis, you are Gregor, a man who wakes up and finds he has mysteriously been transformed into a bug. Navigate a world that has become hauntingly stretched and unfamiliar.

name: Npool
description: A classic game of pool on your Nintendo Switch – play with a friend or hone your skills vs an AI opponent.

name: Golf Club Nostalgia + The Cub Bundle
description: A ruined Earth won’t ruin your fun in this bundle! In Golf Club Nostalgia, return to a desolate Earth for a few rounds of golf. After all, that’s what rich people do right?

name: Hentai Girls: Summer Sweetie
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Search and Rescue: Mount Rainier National Park USA
description: Welcome to Search and Rescue | Mount Rainer National Park Washington USA

name: Free Chess: Soviet Set
description: 1950s Soviet Latvian Chess Set

name: Desktop Farm: Expansion Pack
description: This DLC includes more animals, crops and fences for everyone who likes this game. By buying this DLC you will support my projects.

name: Mordhau: Adventurer Pack
description: This DLC features 4 Armor and Weapons sets.

name: Overlay
description: Overlay is a desktop-overlay, idle game where players own Chickens that generate Eggs to buy Cards to use to upgrade their Chickens to generate more Eggs.

name: It Could Happen to You
description: Your peaceful holiday is interrupted when the small village you’re visiting in becomes terrorized by strange lights on the sky and enigmatic men in black. Some villagers have gone missing, everyone is afraid. Dive into a thrilling adventure with branching narrative and a unique visual style.

name: The Biggleboss Incident
description: There is NOTHING sinister happening at Biggleboss Inc. Or at least that’s what the company motto says. Tom doesn’t have time to debate semantics, though; he’s dangerously late for work – and he hasn’t even started his big Project AGER pitch. …Or is that just what they want him to think?

name: Vengeance Hunters
description:
Vengeance Hunters is an adrenaline fueled Neo-Geo hardware developed beat’em’up that lets you and a friend in local co-op fight mutants, zombies, punks, gangsters, lab techs with bombs (you read that correctly), suited mystery men, cyborgs and more across multiple stages, sub-levels and secret areas.

You'll be focused on fast and frantic action, combos and even a small bit of story. Vengeance Hunters features an amazing OST as well as incredible pixel art. Combat isn't the standard era combat that you've seen over and over since the 90's. Each playable character has their own Signature Move and style that will greatly change how you play.

name: Exodus: Creepy Time
description: Join the battle in the dark world of the Middle Ages, shrouded in evil and magic, as brave knights, each of whom fights to save their native lands from mystical threats. "Exodus: Creepy Time" is an exciting shoot 'em up with a top view, combining elements of roguelike and arcade games.

name: Rabbit's Chronicle
description: An ARPG with a linear story. Play as Corenemo, a rabbit, exploring the Rabbit Kingdom, seeking treasures and aiding or defeating NPCs. Uncover crises while searching for the legendary Golden Apple.

name: The Traveler
description: Lost and alone in a cave, you start your adventure jumping and ducking your way through enemies and different environments. Collect coins to upgrade your player & unlock new abilities. Maybe then you'll find the ancient relics that start to reveal how you got here, and maybe...the way out.

name: Maze: Rising Trials
description: Maze: Rising Trials is a First Person Adventure Puzzle game where you solve your way out of massive and complex labyrinths. Solve puzzles, collect coins, leave markers, and find your path through each maze!

name: Solitary Sentinel
description: Welcome to Solitary Sentinel, a captivating single-player roguelike tower defense experience where you must defend against constantly evolving enemies by upgrading a single tower. Enjoy simple controls, and deep strategic gameplay as you fend off the relentless onslaught!

name: Stellar Larceny
description: Embark on a cosmic heist in this zero-gravity adventure! Maneuver the galaxy as a sentient robot armed with a magnet, jetpack, and gravity boots. Your mission? Infiltrate facilities, find parts, and return life to your friend - while running from a mysterious company intent on shutting you down.

name: Fakutori
description: Fakutori is a laid-back and colorful automation game; place machines, discover new elements, and try to craft the elusive legendary blocks! No limits, no pressure, just blocks!

name: HDMI
description: A rogue-like first-person shooter, battling through the human labs. You must escape with your life, and perhaps with others.

name: Scholomatch
description: Match gems, level up, and date wizards in this match-3 visual novel with a lot of heart and a little spice. Form deep relationships with faeries, sirens and werewolves, each with their own endearing personalities and challenges. Make choices that affect your relationships, and their destinies.

name: Pastures New
description: Pastures New is a farming survival game based in a vast procedurally-generated world. Build, farm and explore the wilderness.

name: Sigils of Slaughter
description: Use sketches and gestures to hack and slash and magic your way through an otherworldly uprising certain to raze the world to nihility. Navigate chaotic urban environments, bringing to bear supernatural weapons and questionable strategies. Embrace the gore. Become the nightmare.

name: Voyager Battles
description: "Voyager Battles invites you to a grid-based battlefield where strategy meets speed. Plan your moves, claim power-ups, and outmaneuver opponents in a fast-paced tactical showdown. Perfect for players seeking a mix of strategy and action. Become the master of the arena!"

name: Level Down
description: Crashed in space, surrounded by collapsing floors, reach for the top...

name: No spikes, please!
description: Avoid the spikes, reach the flag.

name: Submergent
description: Explore and navigate an underwater cave in your submarine.

name: Good Soup
description: Welcome to Good Soup, a deliciously terrifying indie horror game where your simple craving for soup takes a sinister turn. Inspired by the popular Itch.io game "Egg Fried Rice," Good Soup blends everyday mundanity with spine-chilling horror, delivering a uniquely unsettling experience that will leave you hungry for more.
